verses.verse: At<WG1722> that<WG1565> time,<WG2540> Jesus<WG2424> went on<WG4198> the Sabbath day<WG4521> through<WG1223> the grain<WG4702> fields.<WG1161> His<WG846> disciples<WG3101> were hungry<WG3983> and<WG2532> began<WG756> to pluck<WG5089> heads of grain<WG4719> and<WG2532> to eat.<WG2068>

But the Pharisees,<WG5330> when<WG1161> they saw<WG1492> it,<WG2036> said to him,<WG846> "Behold,<WG2400> your<WG4675> disciples<WG3101> do<WG4160> what<WG3739> is<WG1832> not<WG3756> lawful<WG1832> to do<WG4160> on<WG1722> the Sabbath.<WG4521>"

how<WG4459> he entered<WG1525> into<WG1519> the house<WG3624> of God,<WG2316> and<WG2532> ate<WG5315> the<WG740> show<WG4286> bread,<WG740> which<WG3739> was<WG2258> not<WG3756> lawful<WG1832> for him<WG846> to eat,<WG5315> neither<WG3761> for those who were<WG3588> with<WG3326> him,<WG846> but<WG1487> only<WG3441> for<WG3361> the priests?<WG2409>

Of how much<WG4214> more value<WG1308> then<WG3767> is<WG1308> a man<WG444> than a sheep!<WG4263> Therefore<WG5620> it is lawful<WG1832> to do<WG4160> good<WG2573> on the Sabbath day.<WG4521>"

that<WG3704> it might be fulfilled<WG4137> which was spoken<WG4483> through<WG1223> Isaiah<WG2268> the prophet,<WG4396> saying,<WG3004>

All<WG3956> the<WG2532> multitudes<WG3793> were amazed,<WG1839> and<WG2532> said,<WG3004> "Can<WG3385> this<WG3778> be<WG2076> the son<WG5207> of David?<WG1138>"

But when<WG1161> the Pharisees<WG5330> heard<WG191> it,<WG2036> they said, "This<WG3778> man does<WG1544> not<WG3756> cast out<WG1544> demons,<WG1140> except<WG1487> by<WG1722> Beelzebul,<WG954> the prince<WG758> of the demons.<WG1140>"

Knowing<WG1492> their<WG846> thoughts,<WG1761> Jesus<WG2424> said<WG2036> to them,<WG846> "Every<WG3956> kingdom<WG932> divided<WG3307> against<WG2596> itself<WG1438> is brought to desolation,<WG2049> and<WG2532> every<WG3956> city<WG4172> or<WG2228> house<WG3614> divided<WG3307> against<WG2596> itself<WG1438> will<WG2476> not<WG3756> stand.<WG2476>

"He who is<WG5607> not<WG3361> with<WG3326> me<WG1700> is<WG2076> against<WG2596> me,<WG1700> and<WG2532> he who doesn't<WG3361> gather<WG4863> with<WG3326> me,<WG1700> scatters.<WG4650>

"Either<WG2228> make<WG4160> the tree<WG1186> good,<WG2570> and<WG2532> its<WG846> fruit<WG2590> good,<WG2570> or<WG2228> make<WG4160> the tree<WG1186> corrupt,<WG4550> and<WG2532> its<WG846> fruit<WG2590> corrupt;<WG4550> for<WG1063> the tree<WG1186> is known<WG1097> by<WG1537> its fruit.<WG2590>

But the<WG4151> unclean<WG169> spirit,<WG4151> when<WG3752> he is gone<WG1831> out of<WG575> the man,<WG444> passes<WG1330> through<WG1223> waterless<WG504> places,<WG5117> seeking<WG2212> rest,<WG372> and<WG2532> doesn't<WG3756> find it.<WG2147>
